statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, email, gender FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, preference1 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference2 = 'Value';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM browsing_history;
SELECT visitor_id, website_visited, time_visited FROM browsing_history ORDER BY time_visited DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference1, preference2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference1 IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, preference1 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference2 = 'Sports';
SELECT * FROM browsing_history ORDER BY time_visited DESC;
SELECT website_visited, COUNT(visitor_id) FROM browsing_history GROUP BY website_visited;
SELECT customer_id, preference1, preference2 FROM customer_preferences JOIN browsing_history ON customer_id = visitor_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, products.product_name, category FROM customers JOIN customer_preferences ON customers.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id JOIN products ON customer_preferences.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT customer_name, products.product_name, preference_level FROM customers JOIN customer_preferences ON customers.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id JOIN products ON customer_preferences.product_id = products.product_id WHERE preference_level > 3 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, products.product_name, price FROM customers JOIN customer_preferences ON customers.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id JOIN products ON customer_preferences.product_id = products.product_id WHERE price <= 50.00;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_id, category, COUNT(*) AS preference_count FROM preferences GROUP BY customer_id, category;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.name, p.price, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM products p INNER JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.quantity > 5;
SELECT c.name, pr.category, pr.preference_score FROM customers c INNER JOIN preferences pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id WHERE pr.preference_score > 8;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, recommendation_score FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id;
